meta.note: Send to alessio.cazzaniga87@gmail.com for review before real send

emails.subject: For Café del Mar — RAV Vast + Live Looping Sunset Act
emails.body:
Hi Café del Mar team,

Your legendary sunset ritual is exactly what I've been doing for 4 years at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) — Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions.

The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative, builds to organic house. 60-90 min sunset-to-night journey.

Credentials: Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes), Villa Porta resident since 2022.

Here's my sunset set: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ

Would love to discuss a 2026 booking.

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

emails.subject: For your Cone Club Sunset Rituals — RAV Vast Live Performance
emails.body:
Hi 7Pines team,

Your daily sunset rituals at Cone Club are exactly what I specialize in — but with live instruments.

For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4-star boutique), delivering Buddha Bar-style sunset meditation concerts every Friday.

The format: RAV Vast steel tongue drum + live looping. Meditative, elegant, perfectly suited for your luxury sunset programming.

Here's my meditation style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4

Open to explore a collaboration for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

emails.subject: For Phi Beach — RAV Vast + Live Looping (like your saxophone tradition)
emails.body:
Hi Phi Beach team,

Your live saxophone tradition during sunset is exactly my approach — but with RAV Vast steel tongue drum.

I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) for 4 years, doing Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions. The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative on the rocks, builds to organic house.

Credentials: Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes), Villa Porta resident since 2022.

Here's a sunset set: youtu.be/K7oROUjuLGQ

Open to a trial set for summer 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"

emails.subject: For Cova d'en Xoroi — Unique Act for Europe's Most Unique Venue
emails.body:
Hi Cova d'en Xoroi team,

Your natural cave venue deserves a unique act — and that's exactly what I bring.

RAV Vast steel tongue drum + live looping. The sound resonates perfectly in natural acoustics. For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore), doing Buddha Bar-style sunset sessions.

Story: I went from busking on Lake Maggiore to Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes) to luxury residencies. Here's that journey: youtu.be/NI23tAP0c8U

A cave + RAV Vast = magical combination. Open to discuss summer 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

emails.subject: For your Sunday Sunset Spins — RAV Vast + Live Looping
emails.body:
Hi Papagayo team,

Your legendary Sunday sunset sessions are exactly what I do at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore) every Friday.

The format: RAV Vast + percussive guitar + vocals + Ableton. Starts meditative breakfast-bar style, builds to high-energy organic house — perfect for your 10 AM to 4 AM transformation.

Credentials: Greece's Got Talent (4 yes votes), Villa Porta resident 4 years.

Here's my club style: youtu.be/FkBwJJS2ZxQ

Open to a trial Sunday for 2026?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur

emails.subject: Artist Residency Proposal — RAV Vast Sunset Sessions
emails.body:
Hi Gecko team,

Your boutique hotel + beach club combination is perfect for artist residencies — exactly what I'm looking for.

For 4 years I've been resident at Relais Villa Porta (Lake Maggiore, 4-star boutique), delivering Buddha Bar-style sunset meditation concerts every Friday, July-August.

The format: RAV Vast + live looping. Meditative, experimental, intimate. Perfect for your boutique guests.

Here's my meditation style: youtu.be/I-lpfRHTSG4

Open to discuss a summer 2026 residency?

Alessio "Flutur"
linktr.ee/flutur
